message.content: {"given_definition_quality":40,"better_definition":"television; a device for watching TV programs","sentence":"我有电视机。","image_prompt":"A young child sitting on the floor in front of a television, brightly lit with colorful images on the screen. The room looks simple and cozy, and the overall animation style is soft apocalypse: muted tones with a gentle glowing effect around the child and the TV. The television is the central focus, and everything around it seems calm and a little surreal, as if the world outside is quiet and still.","sentence_translation":"I have a television."}
